name: Shushing Face
baseMeaning: A face with a finger to its lips, indicating quiet or secrecy.
tldr: Keep it quiet! Sharing a secret or asking someone to be discreet.

contextMeanings.meaning: Asking someone to be quieter or more discreet.

Hinting at something without revealing it.
Creating mystery or intrigue in a playful way.
